title: Add me for normals, party bonus lets go now
body: everyone add me so we can play some normals or aram or something for this party bonus

replies.body: I did a 5 man team and got 5 ip party bonus. Lucky me
Just playing with randoms just to get the party bonus = Y u do dis
If you queue up solo you'll,  play with randoms and get no party bonus = Y u not do dis??
I didn't say play by yourself. Get some friends
